ai-ne30:1.1_0: Herein, what is there the designation of the dwellings?
ai-ne30:2.1_0: “Right thought, the mind should be rightly understood as right thought.”
ai-ne30:2.2_0: “Rejoicing mind” is guarded, protected by mindfulness, and guarded by the mind.
ai-ne30:2.3_0: “The development of right thought,” is how they are designated:
ai-ne30:2.4_0: “Possessing the right view, ~ who has come to see, and is well known as a place.”
ai-ne30:2.5_0: “The mendicants are given up in serving the desert of the origin of suffering,” they replied.
ai-ne30:2.6_0: The there is no recommendation of thought.
